summary: An independent financial condition report prepared by Macalvins Limited for Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team, covering her financial status from 2015 to 2020. It details her assets, liabilities, net worth, property holdings, and financial transfers, and addresses government allegations about asset alienation and past transfers from Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of the financial report, accused
persons.context: The report details her financial condition from 2015-2020, including assets, net worth, property sales, marriage, asset transfers to trusts, and substantial legal defense expenditures.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Associate, source of past financial transfers
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to government allegations of substantial financial transfers (over $20 million) between his accounts and Ghislaine Maxwell's accounts during 2007-2011, and as a donor to her charity.

connections.description: The report references government allegations of substantial financial transfers (over $20 million) between Epstein's accounts and Maxwell's accounts during 2007-2011, and notes a $57,000 donation from Epstein's foundation to Maxwell's charity in 2013.

events.title: Sale of New York City Property
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell sold a residential property in New York City for $15,075,000. The proceeds were deposited into a UBS account of 116 E 65th LLC and later used to purchase other properties.

events.title: Marriage and Asset Transfer to Trust
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell married her spouse and began filing joint US tax returns. She transferred the majority of her assets into a trust controlled by her spouse and her sister.

events.title: Dissolution of Terramar Charities
events.description: Both Terramar Project Inc (US) and Terramar UK Ltd, charities founded by Ghislaine Maxwell, ceased operations and were dissolved.

events.title: Bail Hearing
events.description: The government referenced transfers from Jeffrey Epstein's accounts to Ghislaine Maxwell's accounts during a bail hearing.

events.title: Reported Net Worth Snapshot
events.description: The report estimates Ghislaine Maxwell and her spouse's combined net worth at approximately $22,500,000, including about $7.67 million in advance legal retainer fees.

locations: Tucked Away 338 East Washington Rd Bradford, NH 03221
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's net worth was approximately $20.2 million in January 2015 and an estimated $22.5 million by October 2020, including ~$7.67 million in legal retainer fees.
In 2016, Maxwell transferred the majority of her assets into a trust controlled by her spouse and her sister.

The report addresses and disputes government allegations of asset alienation, stating no significant sums were transferred outside her or her spouse's control from 2015-2020, aside from ordinary living expenses and legal defense costs.

The report notes government allegations of over $20 million in transfers between Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell's accounts from 2007-2011 but states no such transfers were found in the 2015-2020 review period.
Maxwell's charity, Terramar Project Inc, received a $57,000 donation from the 'Epstein Interests Foundation' in the financial year ending January 21, 2013.
